SELECT m.id, m.name inoutitemName, m.type inoutitemType, m.remark, CONVERT (m.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_inoutitem m WHERE m.delete_flag = 0
AND m.name LIKE '%${inoutitemName}%'
AND m.type = #{inoutitemType}
AND m.remark LIKE '%${remark}%'
ORDER BY m.create_time DESC
SELECT m.id FROM erp_inoutitem m WHERE m.delete_flag = 0 AND m.name = #{inoutitemName} ORDER BY m.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT m.id, m.name inoutitemName, m.type inoutitemType, m.remark, CONVERT (m.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_inoutitem m WHERE m.delete_flag = 0 AND m.id = #{id} ORDER BY m.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT m.id FROM erp_inoutitem m WHERE m.delete_flag = 0 AND m.name = #{inoutitemName} AND m.id != #{id} ORDER BY m.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT m.id, m.name inoutitemName, m.type inoutitemType, m.remark, CONVERT (m.create_time, CHAR) createTime FROM erp_inoutitem m WHERE m.delete_flag = 0 AND m.id = #{id} ORDER BY m.create_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM erp_inoutitem a WHERE a.type = #{type}
